title: HOUR 3 - Mark Karboly
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Mark Karboly
description:
In hour 3, Colin recaps the Dana White story about Tom Brady and the Raiders. Mark Karboly joins to talk the impact George Pickens will have as Rookie WR in Pittsburgh. Kenny Picketts early struggles and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
